summary: This document is a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services, authorizing the removal of authorities on several accounts. It indicates Maxwell's role as Power of Attorney, suggesting a financial transaction or management context.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the sender of the letter, authorizing actions on her financial accounts.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Scott Stackman is the recipient of the letter from Ghislaine Maxwell, representing UBS Financial Services.

locations: 1285 Avenue of the Americas, 38th Floor, New York, NY 10019
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell is acting as Power of Attorney in this correspondence.
The letter is addressed to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services.
Maxwell authorizes the removal of authorities on multiple financial accounts.
